mapper.insert: insert into consult( con_no, con_subject, con_writer, con_ron, con_date, con_content, con_re_ref, con_re_lev) values(consult_seq.nextval, #{con_subject}, #{con_writer}, 'X', SYSDATE, #{con_content}, consult_seq.nextval, 0 )
mapper.select: select count(*) from consult where con_no=#{con_no} and con_re_lev=1

select * from( select rownum rnum, con_no, con_subject, con_writer, con_ron, con_date, con_content, con_re_ref, con_re_lev from( select * from consult order by con_re_ref desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
